 Vi tror på att en mångfald av perspektiv och erfarenheter är nyckeln till att skapa en mer inkluderande och framgångsrik arbetsplats. Därför välkomnar vi alla oavsett kön, ålder, bakgrund och etnisk tillhörighet.
   

  

 Vill du vara med och utveckla Coops lojalitetslösningar och skapa värde för våra medlemmar? Vi söker en engagerad Produktägare som vill driva utvecklingen av våra applikationer inom lojalitet.
   

  

***Om rollen***
 Som Produktägare för Lojalitet ansvarar du för flertalet applikationer som är en del av medlemsupplevelsen på Coop, bland annat de som hanterar affärsregler för medlemsprogrammet samt kunddatabas. Du förväntas ha teknisk förståelse för hur systemen samverkar och kunna driva förbättringar i en komplex IT-arkitektur. Du arbetar nära verksamhet och berörda utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa att vi levererar lösningar som stärker medlemsupplevelsen. En del i ditt uppdrag framåt är bland annat att utvärdera dagens applikationer och driva vissa förflyttningar. Du leder ett tvärfunktionellt team med roller såsom Business analyst, Tech lead och utvecklare (både on-site och offshore).
   

  

**Dina Huvudsakliga Ansvarsområden**
* Ägarskap för lojalitetsrelaterade system och applikationer
* Säkerställer att utvecklingen är i linje med affärsmål och kundbehov
* Prioritera och planera utveckling i nära samarbete med verksamheten samt hantera budget
* Arbetsleda utvecklingsresurser
* Driva förbättringsinitiativ inom lojalitetsområdet
* Följa upp och kommunicera resultat och status till intressenter
* Arbeta enligt SAFe-metodik och bidra till ett agilt och målstyrt arbetssätt
* Leda ett team utan personalansvar, men med tydligt leveransansvar


***Vem är du?***
 Du har erfarenhet av produktägarskap eller liknande roller samt ett intresse för lojalitetsområdet. Du är driven, strukturerad och analytiskt med stark teknisk kompetens samt förmåga att omsätta affärsbehov till hållbara lösningar.
   

  

**Vi Tror Att Du Har**
* Erfarenhet som Produktägare eller liknande roll
* God teknisk förståelse
* God förståelse och erfarenhet av tekniska utvecklingsprocesser inkl agila arbetssätt, kunskap om verktyg som Jira, Azure DevOps eller liknande
* Erfarenhet av samarbete & utveckling med externa leverantörer
* Akademisk utbildning inom relevant område
* Förmåga att leda tvärfunktionella team och driva initiativ/frågeställningar framåt
* God förståelse för digitala lösningar och kundcentrerad utveckling
* Mycket god kommunikativ förmåga på både svenska och engelska


**Meriterande**
* Tidigare erfarenhet av lojalitetsområdet/applikationer
* Erfarenhet från dagligvaruhandeln


**Vårt Erbjudande Till Dig**
 Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats där du får möjlighet att växa och utvecklas i en inkluderande och inspirerande kultur. Hos oss på Coop får du vara en del av ett engagerat team och bidra till en mer hållbar framtid. Vi erbjuder även konkurrenskraftiga förmåner, flexibel arbetstid och en god balans mellan arbete och fritid.
   

  

**Så Ansöker Du**
 Låter detta som din nästa utmaning? Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt då vi arbetar löpande med urval och intervjuer. För att rättvist matcha kandidater med de krav som rollen ställer kommer vi att använda tester under urvalsarbetet.
   

  

 Om du har några frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Viktoria Fridlund, på e-post Viktoria.Fridlund@coop.se

title: Embeddedutvecklare– Software Acceleration Team
description:
*Drivs du av att se dina idéer bli verklighet? Välkommen till vår spännande och teknikintensiva värld.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Vill du vara med och accelerera framtidens inbyggda mjukvara?
   

  

 Vi söker nu erfarna och nyfikna embedded-utvecklare till ett av våra Software Acceleration-team. Du kommer att ingå i ett team som tillsammans tar sig an olika typer av inbyggda utvecklingsuppdrag – från system nära hårdvara till avancerade realtidsplattformar.
   

  

 Som Embedded Utvecklare i ett Software Acceleration-team arbetar du både hands-on med kod och tillsammans med andra specialister för att skapa lösningar som stärker våra produktteam och bidrar till Saabs gemensamma mjukvaruarkitektur.
   

  

 Du kommer att:
   

  

* Utveckla och integrera inbyggd mjukvara i varierande miljöer – från realtidsoperativsystem till edge-enheter.
* Samarbeta med arkitekter, utvecklare och domänexperter för att etablera effektiva och hållbara lösningar.
* Bidra till att utveckla och förfina Common Techs arbetssätt och verktyg.
* Dela kunskap, driva förbättringar och bidra till en kultur som värdesätter lärande och nyfikenhet.


 Våra acceleration-team arbetar nära produktorganisationerna och hjälper dem att leverera snabbare, samtidigt som vi stärker deras långsiktiga förmåga. Det betyder att uppdragen varierar – och du får möjlighet att växa i bredd och djup.
   

  

**Varför Common Tech?**
 Common Tech är Saabs gemensamma teknikorganisation som stödjer alla produktteams i utvecklingen av programvarudefinierade produkter. Här bygger vi den tekniska grunden för nästa generations produkter – snabbare, smartare och med högre kvalitet.
   

  

 Som del av Common Tech får du möjlighet att:
   

  

* Accelerera kundvärde inom alla Saabs produktområden
* Påverka framtida arbetssätt i en nyformad organisation
* Arbeta i teknikens spets – från hårdvarunära kod till systemarkitektur
* Samarbeta med några av Saabs mest erfarna utvecklare och arkitekter


 Din profil
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har en T-formad kompetensprofil – du har djup inom ett eller flera områden, men också bredd och nyfikenhet att ta dig an nya tekniska utmaningar. Som person är du nyfiken, samarbetsinriktad och lösningsorienterad. Du trivs i en miljö där strukturer och arbetssätt växer fram och där du kan vara med och påverka.
   

  

 Du har sannolikt erfarenhet av flera av följande områden:
   

  

* Inbyggd utveckling i C eller C++
* Erfarenhet av Xilinx Zynq-arkitektur eller x86-plattformar
* Erfarenhet av GPU-arkitekturer eller hårdvarunära optimering
* Embedded-operativsystem med realtidsegenskaper (t.ex. FreeRTOS, Yocto)
* Boot-sekvenser, drivrutiner och systeminitialisering
* Kommunikation via Ethernet, serieprotokoll och IEEE 802-standarder (t.ex. Time-Sensitive Networking)


 Meriterande:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av robotik och/eller autonoma fordon


*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*
 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
   

  

 Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.

title: Azure Tekniker
description:
Som
 **Azure Tekniker** 
 hos oss blir du en
 **central del av vårt team** 
 och får chansen att arbeta med några av marknadens mest spännande molnprojekt. Vi letar efter dig som
 **brinner för teknik** 
 , gillar att lösa problem och vill vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar! 🚀
   

  

* Bygga och drifta molnlösningar – Du ser till att våra kunders Azure-miljöer är stabila, säkra och optimerade.
* Migrera och modernisera – Du hjälper till att flytta verksamheter från traditionella IT-miljöer till moderna molnplattformar.
* Felsöka och förbättra – Du identifierar flaskhalsar, säkerhetsrisker och optimeringsmöjligheter.
* Stödja och samarbeta – Du arbetar tätt ihop med arkitekter, utvecklare och kunder för att skapa de bästa lösningarna.
* Lära och utvecklas – Tekniken förändras snabbt, och vi ser till att du alltid ligger steget före genom kompetensutveckling och utbildningar.


 Här får du en
 **praktisk och varierad roll** 
 där du både får jobba hands-on och utvecklas strategiskt – med stöd av ett erfaret och härligt team!
   

  

**Vi söker dig som** 
 🌟
   

  

* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta som konsult inom IT-infrastruktur, med fokus på Azure.
* Besitter teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts infrastruktur- och plattformstjänster i Azure.
* Är van vid att arbeta med molnlösningar och har en proaktiv inställning till problemlösning.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 🎁
   

  

* Konkurrenskraftig lön som speglar din erfarenhet och kompetens. 💰
* Flexibla arbetsförhållanden för att underlätta balansen mellan arbete och privatliv.
* Stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling genom interna utbildningar och vår egen Cloud Skola. 📚
* En inkluderande och stödjande arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och ditt engagemang värdesätts.
* Sociala aktiviteter och gemensamma evenemang, från årliga konferensresor till regelbundna After Works och andra roliga aktiviteter. 🎉


**Om B3 Consulting Group**
*B3 Consulting Group är ett expansivt konsultbolag med cirka 1000 medarbetare. Vi brinner för innovation och hjälper Sveriges ledande företag och organisationer att skapa framtidens möjligheter genom digital transformation. B3 finns på* 
 tolv orter i Sverige samt i Polen, med huvudkontor i Stockholm. Bolaget grundades 2003, är noterat på Nasdaq Stockholm Small Cap och omsatte 1 141 MSEK 2023.
   

  

*Vi är stolta över vår prisbelönta företagskultur, där olikheter, erfarenheter och gemensam energi värdesätts. Som ett etiskt och transparent bolag strävar vi efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi är även engagerade i Women in Tech och initiativ för att stärka AI-utbildning för kvinnor. 2024 utsågs vi till Årets Employer Branding-företag, och vår HR-chef vann titeln Årets HR-chef.*
 💌
 **Låter det spännande?** 
 Hör av dig! Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!

title: Market Developer
description:
**Introduction**
 Our international team is expanding the Sales department with talented Market Developers experienced in helping companies grow their client base. If you are an experienced Market Developer with a proven sales track record in selling services, rate yourself high on communication skills and know your way around clients, keep reading!
   

  

**Primary Responsibilities**
* Develop a strong understanding of PCG’s business and well-defined service portfolio in order to turn leads to new sales
* Promote and represent PCG’s services
* Prospect and qualify new sales leads following a defined sales process
* Schedule meetings and presentations with prospects
* Create, plan, and deliver presentations on company services
* Daily tracking of all sales activities in company CRM system
* Maintain a well-developed pipeline of prospects
* Develop strong, ongoing relationships with prospects
* Prepare, send and follow up on contracts sent based on company templates
* Collaborate closely with Solutions Architects when proposing solutions to prospects
* Negotiate contract terms with clients and communicate with stakeholders
* Ability and willingness to travel for meetings with prospective and existing clients
* Coordinate with other team members and departments to optimize the sales effort
* Meet or exceed monthly KPIs
* Create weekly reports for management
* Regularly collecting and analyzing the insights from the sales activities and providing feedback to the management team


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Communications, or a related field
* 5+ years of sales experience
* Native or bilingual Swedish speaker
* Fluency in English is a must
* Tech-savvy with a good understanding of IT concepts
* Working experience in the Tech industry or technical background
* Proven ability to meet and exceed sales quotas
* Proven track record of successfully managing customer relationships
* Excellent interpersonal skills
* Highly self-motivated and achievement oriented
* Strong verbal and written communication and presentation skills
* Proficient in Microsoft Office
* Working knowledge of CRM systems


**Desired Skills**
* Self-confident
* Customer service oriented
* Upbeat, creative and highly engaged
* Great organizational skills
* Strong interest in cloud services
* Attention to detail, great listening and speaking skills
* Innovative – prefers working in unconventional ways or on tasks that require creativity
* Intermediate knowledge of a few other European languages


**We Offer**
* Competitive compensation
* Premium equipment
* 20+ paid vacation days
* Personalised career path
* An international, friendly and collaborative environment
* Hybrid work model
* Possibility for learning and self-realisation
* Flat hierarchy and inclusive environment


**About PCG**
 Public Cloud Group (PCG) supports companies in their digital transformation through the use of public cloud solutions.
   

  

 With a product portfolio designed to accompany organisations of all sizes in their cloud journey and competence that is a synonym for highly qualified staff that clients and partners like to work with, PCG is positioned as a reliable and trustworthy partner for the hyperscalers, relevant and with repeatedly validated competence and credibility.
   

  

 We have the highest partnership status with the three relevant hyperscalers: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google, and Microsoft. As experienced providers, we advise our customers independently with cloud implementation, application development, and managed services.

title: Senior Growth Manager - EdTech (French fluent )
description:
Are you obsessed with turning insights into measurable growth?


What if your experiments didn’t just lift conversions but shaped how millions of people grow, learn, and act on their potential?

**This isn’t another growth job.**

**It’s the chance to define a new category : The EcoSystem** for Human Greatness Augmented with AI, combining behavioral science, technology, and AI.

**We’re not looking for someone who only advises on what to test, we’re looking for someone who builds it.**

**A hands-on Head Of Growth who can ideate, copy, design the strategy and launch experiments directly.**

**Someone who speaks both data and persuasion fluently, and leverages AI tools daily to generate hypotheses, build assets, and accelerate iteration speed.**

**And you deserve it because you are…**

* A **Conversion Architect**, skilled at diagnosing funnel bottlenecks and translating data into structured experimentation roadmaps that deliver measurable business outcomes.
* A **Behavioral Strategist**, fascinated by what drives human action, able to mix cognitive psychology, UX, and persuasion frameworks to design experiences that convert because they *resonate*.
* A **Data-driven Creator**, fluent in GA4, Hotjar, AB Tasty, VWO, Amplitude, not just running tests, but connecting insights to revenue, retention, and lifetime value.


This is a full-time position, carried out **remotely or from our beautiful offices** in Dubaï or Lisbon.  

**French and English fluency is required.**

**About Paradox**
-----------------


-

**WHAT WE DO**
--------------


At Paradox, we are convinced that greatness is trainable.

**That’s why** we want to empower people at scale, by leveraging cutting edge technologies like AI, and crafting user experiences with outstanding aesthetics.


We do that by merging :

* **Human Intelligence** (coaches, peers, and mentors)
* **Structured Intelligence** (protocols, mental models, rituals),
* **Technological Intelligence** (AI personalization, feedback loops, adaptive journeys)

  

To create one seamless ecosystem: **Paradox OS**.

**OUR BELIEFS**
---------------


We believe self-help is broken.  

Most learning platforms are used the same way : consuming generic theories, getting quick highs, ending with no real change.


At **Paradox**, we believe people deserve more.  

More than content. More than motivation.


They deserve a **system that knows them**, one that adapts, challenges, and grows with them.


We believe that **every human learns differently**, and that technology can do more than entertain or save time.  

It can **translate insight into transformation**, through **AI personalization, lean experimentation, and deep psychological understanding**.


Because learning shouldn’t just make you feel inspired for a day, it should **change how you live, think, and create.**

**OUR VISION**
--------------


At Paradox, we want to re-invent how people grow.


We do not build another course or coaching app but the Operating System for Greatness.


Founded by David Laroche, a creator followed by over 2 million people and known for his interviews with icons like Tony Parker, Mike Horn, Richard Branson, and Gad Elmaleh, Paradox aims to build something that will live beyond any individual (including its founder), for decades to come.


Our ambition is to compete with players like Mindvalley (150M ARR), but with a sharper vision, grounded protocols for achievers, people who want more for their life, refusing mediocrity.


To do that, we bring together designers, tech, coaches, and filmmakers to create learning experiences that are cinematic, precise, and effective.


We move fast, aim high, and hold ourselves to the standards of Apple, Spotify, and MasterClass. No fluff, focused on meaningful impact.


While others hide their numbers, we want to let our results speak loudly for us.


Get obsessed with transforming our clients’ lives and let those transformations *be our* marketing.

**And that’s where you come in.**

**YOUR MISSION**
----------------

-

**Architect and pilot the Revenue Engine.** You will transition Paradox from a founder-led marketing approach to a brand-led, repeatable, data-driven engine.


You don't just manage a team, you get your hands dirty to identify growth levers and pull them yourself. Your obsession: taking a funnel, dismantling it, and rebuilding it to convert 2x better. You lead from the front, testing hypotheses, launching new channels, and showing the team how it's done.

### **YOUR KEY RESPONSIBILITIES**

**1. Offer–Market Fit continuously assessed, refined, repositioned, and launched**

* Identify which segments an offer truly works for and which it doesn’t.
* Refine, reposition, or stop offers based on evidence.


2**. Architect Funnels and campaigns (Hands-On)**

* You don't just "request" new funnels, you map them out and oversee their implementation directly.
* You set up the tracking, you check the flows, and you ensure the machine works before managing budget scaling.

**3. Relentless Optimization (CRO & A/B Testing)**

* You design, launch, and analyze A/B tests yourself (headlines, pricing, offers…). You don't wait for a report, you dig into the data to find the winner.
* You proactively hunt for friction points in the user journey. If a page isn't converting, you audit it, propose a fix, and implement the test immediately with the team.
* Design, launch, and analyze experiments across funnels, pricing, messaging
* Ensure tracking, data integrity, and learnings compound over time

**4. Channel Exploration & Scaling**

* While Yann manages our core Paid Social (Meta), *your* job is to overview Yann’s work and identify the *next* winning acquisition channels to maximize Profitability and Volume (ROI/ROAS).
* You are the "Client" of the Content Factory. You analyze ad performance, provide data-backed briefs to the Content Strategist and identify winning angles quickly to scale them aggressively.

**5. Growth Loops**

* Design and optimize growth loops (product, retention, referral, content product content)
* Diagnose growth across acquisition, activation, sales alignment, retention, and expansion
* Identify where growth is constrained and why

**6. "Player-Coach" Leadership**

* You manage the Growth team (Paid, Copy, Web, PMM) by showing them the standard of excellence. You are their sparring partner for strategy, copy angles, and technical execution.
* You’re responsible to build your team by sourcing talents, to manage them, to train them and to stop with them while necessary.

**7. Sales Alignment & Revenue Quality**

* Your metric isn't just "Leads generated", it's "Appointments held" and "Deals closed". You set up a tight feedback loop with the Sales Team Lead to adjust targeting based on lead quality.
* You prioritize High-Intent leads over cheap volume. You stop campaigns that bring tire-kickers, even if the CPL is low.

**Tools you’ll master:**  

GA4, Optibase, Wefblow, Vidalytics, Clarity, Hotjar, Amplitude, Figma, Looker Studio, VWO, Optimizely, and whatever helps you see what others miss.


You’ll own KPIs :

* LTV / CAC ratio
* Funnel conversion rates by stage
* X experiments launched per week

### **Desired Outcomes**

* Conversion Rates 2× better than baseline
* Growth experimentation runs continuously
* A Predictable Growth Engine

**DO YOU RECOGNIZE YOURSELF?**
------------------------------

### **-**

### **Experience**

* **You have ideally a minimum of 3 years of experience in Conversion Rate Optimization, Growth Experimentation, or Performance Marketing,** ideally within SaaS, e-commerce, or digital product environments.
* **You have a track record of designing, implementing, and scaling A/B and multivariate tests** that have generated measurable improvements in revenue, user activation, or conversion.

**Competencies**

* **Growth Diagnosis & System Thinking**
* **Persuasion & Behavioral Insight**
* **Analytical**

### **Personality**

* **Curiosity**: You relentlessly dig into why users behave the way they do until you uncover the insight behind the data.
* Hands-On Execution
* **Precision:** You care about clarity in hypotheses, clean data, and unambiguous results.
* **Agility:** You move fast, adapt instantly to new findings, and turn insights into tests within hours, not weeks.

### **Language**


French: Native / Bilingual  

English: Fluent English, you can hold a conversation on specific details with English-speaking colleagues.


Our chosen language for written communication is English.

**IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU**
---------------------------

### **-**


If you need clarity before chaos — wrong place.  

If you prefer balance over intensity — wrong season.  

If you build to deliver, not to *elevate* — wrong mission.  

If you want to optimize without getting your hands dirty in Webflow, copy, or design — wrong role.

**WHY JOIN US**
---------------

### **-**


Help us market a product that fuses **neuroscience, design, and AI** to reinvent how humans grow.


Work with filmmakers, psychologists, engineers, and creatives obsessed with impact.


In the heart of our headquarters stands the **100 000 Dreams Wall**,


Every photo on that wall is a life rewritten:


“I ran a marathon.”


“I started my company.”


“I found peace with my father.”

  

You will **play a crucial role in the development of an Iconic Product.**

### ***Growth & Ambition***

* > Being **surrounded by A-players who strive to perform**

### ***Impact & Meaning***

* > **Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products will be used by millions of people**
* > **Waking up in the morning feeling like you are making a difference** is something!

*We receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a milestone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.** **> Contributing to** *the Paradox Foundation (our non-profit), dedicated to empower teenagers*

***But that's not all, we believe that driven people deserve…***

### ***Freedom & Well Being***

* > **A company culture based on autonomy & accountability**
* > **Flexible working hours**
* > **A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want**


-> **Magnificent office in Dubai, Paris, Lisbon** - it feels like home :)

* > **Work on Mac**, for us it counts :)
* > **350€ per year paid by the company to take care of yourself** ( for your gym, or dance class or whatever make you feel great)


-> **150€ of books or education** - At Paradox, we are learner lovers and we want to support you in that


-> **6 1:1coachings** - A Paradox Coach supporting you on anything personal or professional, we want you to live your best life

**HIRING PROCESS**
------------------

### **-**

**A 6 to 8 minutes application survey.**


**A 15-30 minutes video call** with Timy, our HR, to assess the fit between the position, the company, and your own career path.  

**A video-call focused on your career** with Quentin, VP Marketing, to review your background & see how we can match your desires with our needs.  

**A** **culture-fit video call** to check in depth the alignment between you and our values and culture.  

**Reference calls** to get in-depth insights about how you work in different environments, make your onboarding easier, and give everybody on the team the insurance to be surrounded by A-Players.  

**Welcome aboard!**

  

If you’re not joining to tweak landing pages.  

If you’re here to engineer behavioral change at scale, for millions.


Welcome to **Paradox.**


Let’s build the Operating System for Greatness.

title: Product Designer - H&M Womenswear Light Woven
description:
**Job Description**

 Exciting new opportunity to join H&M as a Fashion Designer within our Womenswear Light Woven department. As a Product Designer, you'll lead the way in identifying key products and crafting the perfect assortment for our target customers. We seek a passionate Designer skilled in building strong collections.
   

  





 Able to communicate your vision and product ideas in a clear way with a creative, fashion forward and commercial focus. Essentially you will have the ability to work close to season with a high pace proactive approach and able to build & maintain strong relationships both internally and with external partners.
   

  





 If you're a Designer who loves to collaborate, work in a team, and provide diverse markets with the best products sold worldwide than H&M could be the brand for you. This role will be handling a collection with a focus on light wovens across dresses, blouses, skirts and light trousers. It is key to have a high fashion sense of style and trends for our target customer, while maintaining a cost-conscious awareness throughout the design process.
   

  





 The role requires strong drive, high energy, creativity, and experience in coaching & leading others to commercial success!
   

  





**Qualifications**




 A minimum of a BA/MA or equivalent experience in Fashion/Textile Design
   

  




* Minimum of 3 years’ work experience as a Designer for Light Woven product types
* Background from an aspirational global brand or retailer
* International experience is meriting
* Attention to detail with strong knowledge on light woven products
* A creative mindset with sharp eye for both current and future trends
* Strong customer focus and commercial mindset for H&M´s global womenswear customer
* Experience working closely with suppliers/factories in Asia and Europe
* Strong skills in and used to working in Adobe Creative Suite programs
* 3D CLO is meriting
* Demonstrated communication skills and true collaborative team player
* Leadership and coaching mindset
* Independent, driven & proactive with “one step ahead” mindset
* Organized & structured, able to set priorities and follow timelines
* Flexible mindset and adaptable to changes in a fast moving & growing industry
* Fluent in English (Swedish not necessary)



**Additional information**




 This position is based in Stockholm, to start asap. You will report into the department Assortment Manager and work with a like-minded team of passionate Designers/Product Developers and Planners.
   

  





 If your experience, skills, and ambitions are right for this role,
 **please send your application including CV and relevant portfolio work** 
 (pdf max 10mb/uploading) Portfolio should include vision/mood boards, full design process and final collections and products from a variety of fashion design projects. All documents should be in English. Please ensure to include some work clearly relatable to the aspirational H&M Women’s target customer.
   

  





**Benefits**
  

 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  





*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*




**Inclusion & Diversity**
  

*H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse, and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience, and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.*




*We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.*




**Company Description**
  

 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H & M here.

title: Learning Product Designer - AI x EdTech (French fluent 🇫🇷)
description:
**⚠️ If you’re looking for a regular Learning Design job, stop reading here.**
**This Isn’t Another LXD Job.**
**It’s the chance to redefine what learning feels like :** 
 to craft the experiences inside the OS for Human Greatness Augmented with AI.
   

  

**Science-backed. Design-led. AI-powered. Global.**
 At Paradox, we’re building a
 **new category** 
 :
   

  

 An ecosystem that fuses
 *neuroscience, design, AI,* 
 and
 *behavioral transformation*
 so that people don’t just consume knowledge, but
 *rewire who they are.*
 You’ll be designing
 **experiences, not lessons.**
**Deep inside you are looking for a new adventure with…**
* 🚀Ambition : Smart Team mates driven to create an iconic international product
* 🔥Impact : you strive for making a real difference in the company growth, and not be a number in a big organization
* 😍Mission : knowing your greatness left a mark in people lives, through technology and behavioral science


**At Paradox, we are convinced that greatness is trainable.**
**That’s why** 
 we want to empower people at scale, by leveraging cutting edge technologies like AI, and crafting user experiences with outstanding aesthetics.
   

  

 We do that by merging :
   

  

* Human Intelligence (coaches, peers, and mentors)
* Structured Intelligence (protocols, mental models, rituals),
* Technological Intelligence (AI personalization, feedback loops, adaptive journeys)


 To create one seamless ecosystem:
 **Paradox OS** 
 .
   

  

 Your mission is to turn this ecosystem into
 **beautifully orchestrated learning arcs** 
 that feel alive, cinematic, and deeply human.
   

  

**This is why we are looking for a LXD to make Paradox a category-defining global brand loved for its learning experiences.**
 This is a full time position from our beautiful offices in Dubai, Paris or Lisbon or remotely anywhere in the world.
   

  

**OUR BELIEFS**
 We believe self-help is broken.
   

  

 Most learning platforms are used the same way : consuming generic theories, getting quick highs, ending with no real change.
   

  

 At
 **Paradox** 
 , we believe people deserve more.
   

  

 More than content. More than motivation.
   

  

 They deserve a
 **system that knows them** 
 , one that adapts, challenges, and grows with them.
   

  

 At Paradox,
 **learning = transformation.**
 We believe that technology can do more than entertain or save time. It can
 **translate insight into transformation** 
 , through
 **AI personalization, lean experimentation, and deep psychological understanding** 
 .
   

  

 Because learning shouldn’t just make you feel inspired for a day, it should
 **change how you live, think, and create.**
**OUR VISION**
 At Paradox, we want to re-invent how people grow.
   

  

 We do not build another course or coaching app but the Operating System for Greatness.
   

  

 Founded by David Laroche, a creator followed by over 2 million people and known for his interviews with icons like Tony Parker, Mike Horn, Richard Branson, and Gad Elmaleh, Paradox aims to build something that will live beyond any individual (including its founder), for decades to come.
   

  

 Our ambition is to compete with players like Mindvalley (150M ARR), but with a sharper vision, grounded protocols for achievers, people who want more for their life, refusing mediocrity.
   

  

 To do that, we bring together designers, tech, coaches, and filmmakers to create learning experiences that are cinematic, precise, and effective.
   

  

 We move fast, aim high, and hold ourselves to the standards of Apple, Spotify, and MasterClass. No fluff, focused on meaningful impact.
   

  

 Get obsessed with transforming our clients’ lives, treat it like a science, build, measure, improve
   

  

 and let those transformations
 *be our* 
 marketing.
   

  

 While others hide their numbers, we want to let our results speak loudly for us.
   

  

**YOUR MISSION 🚀**
 As our Learning Experience Designer, you’ll bridge
 **psychology, storytelling, and product design** 
 to craft experiences that make people say:
   

  

 “This didn’t just teach me, it
 *changed me.* 
 ”
   

  

 Each cycle you lead will integrate:
   

  

* Protocols : guided frameworks that rewire perception, emotion, and action.
* Loops : adaptive, AI-powered coaching cycles that evolve with each user.
* Personalization : experiences that feel uniquely theirs, every time.
* AI agents : Specialised agents that enhance the student journey with the right actionable insights.


**🎯 YOUR 4 MAIN MISSIONS**
* Learning Experience Architecture - Owns the full learning system, from architecture to execution
* Design the journey, not just the content and lesson.
* Script learning experiences that engage both heart and brain: Each word, exercise, and soundscape must serve transformation, not just knowledge.
* Ensure every feature supports the evolution of the Paradox ecosystem: Loops, PX Agents, Protocols, Membership.
* Craft a premium, high-impact course experience
* Craft new courses with experts.
* Co-craft courses with top performers, translating their genius into cinematic, science-based learning journeys.
* Lead the end-to-end design of the course, from initial strategy to final content delivery.
* Own scripting, copywriting, and the creation of educational assets (e.g., learning modules, assessments, reflection prompts, supplemental materials).
* Conduct desk and user research to inform course goals, learner personas, and curriculum structure.
* Craft AI Conversations and Loops
* Write and optimize prompt chains, refine tone and flow until every exchange feels human and transformative.
* Review conversations with AI to refine the agents.
* Analyze, Measure, Iterate for Transformation and Stickiness
* Define KPIs of transformation (not just completion).
* Iterate on the course using learner data, feedback, and performance metrics.
* Be obsessed with user problems : talk to users weekly, analyze patterns, and identify where transformation breaks.
* Apply principles from habit formation, self-determination theory, and behavioral triggers to drive daily practice and retention.


**THE IDEAL CANDIDATE 😍**
**Experience :**
* 3–6 years as in Learning Design, Instructional Design, or Experience Design (EdTech, Coaching, or Transformational Education preferred).
* You’ve shipped at least one major feature or product end-to-end, and can show measurable results.
* Comfortable with AI tools, Figma.
* Proven track record of designing and delivering digital learning experiences across a variety of asset types (e.g. video, written articles, assessments, interactive experiences, etc.).
* Portfolio of one or more “cinematic / narrative-rich” courses or learning programs (e.g. not just corporate training, but premium courses).


**Traits :**
* Craft-obsessed: You get things done, you love to work much beyond 9-5, you have a doer mentality, a bias for outcomes and want to be a beast in your field.
* Strong writing skills: You’re a strong editorial thinker with experience producing high-quality content for external audiences.
* Strong aesthetic sensibility: You care how the course “feels”.
* User and Impact Obsessed: You think in outcomes, not outputs, you care about transformation.
* Critical Thinker: You can turn a vague problem into a clear hypothesis, You can challenge your own assumptions, break models, and rebuild them grounded in real data, field insights, and lived experience.
* Digital and AI savvy: You’re able to build AI Agents (if not, you demonstrate ability to learn while applying).


**Language**
**French** 
 : native
   

  

**English** 
 : Fluent English, you can hold a conversation on specific details with English-speaking colleagues.
   

  

 Our chosen language for written communication is English.
   

  

**IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU**
 Until you’ve felt what a perfect loop, prompt, or emotional shift sounds like, you can’t systematize it.
   

  

 The early versions of PX Agents and Loops are language-sensitive.
   

  

 The difference between “What did you feel?” and “What are you feeling?” changes the user’s emotional state.
   

  

 That requires someone who rewrites lines several times, not someone who just optimizes the spreadsheet.
   

  

 If you think it’s overthinking, this won’t fit.
   

  

 ❌ If you want to design a program on a subject like Critical Thinking, Negotiation without reading four of the best books on it, this is not for you.
   

  

 ❌ If you need clarity before chaos, wrong place.
   

  

 ❌ If you prefer balance over intensity, wrong season.
   

  

 ❌Surface-level Vision Alignment
 **:** 
 you like the idea of Paradox but doesn’t want to
 *get* 
 the depth. Paradox is design-led; you must
 *touch the product* 
 , not just manage it.
   

  

**WHY JOIN US ❤️**
 Because we’re not just teaching people.
   

  

 You’ll join a collective of
 **filmmakers, designers, psychologists, and engineers**
 who believe
 *greatness is trainable* 
 and that learning should feel like art.
   

  

 Build a product that fuses
 **neuroscience, design, and AI** 
 to reinvent how humans grow.
   

  

 The chance to build a product that could redefine human potential.
   

  

 Work with filmmakers, psychologists, engineers, and creatives obsessed with impact.
   

  

 In the heart of our headquarters stands the
 **100 000 Dreams Wall** 
 ,
   

  

 Every photo on that wall is a life rewritten:
   

  

 “I ran a marathon.”
   

  

 “I started my company.”
   

  

 “I found peace with my father.”
   

  

 You will
 **play a crucial role in the development of an Iconic company**
 Currently, our videos have been viewed over 100 million times.
   

  

***Growth and Ambition***
* > 🏅Being surrounded by A-players who strive to perform


***Competitive Salary***
*But you don’t just want a competitive paycheck, you also want…*
***Impact and Meaning***
* > Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products will be used by millions of people
* > Waking up in the morning feeling like you are making a difference is something!


*We receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a milestone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.*
* > ❤️ Contributing to the Paradox Foundation (our non-profit), dedicated to empower teenagers


***But that's not all, we believe that driven people deserve…***
***Freedom and Well Being 🗽***
* > 😎A company culture based on autonomy and accountability
* > 🗽Flexible working hours
* > 🌎A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want
* > 🏤Magnificent office in Dubai, Paris, Lisbon - it feels like home :)
* > 🧍‍♀️Standing desks paid by the company if you live far from our offices
* > 💻Work on Mac, for us it counts :)
* > 🏀350€ per year paid by the company to take care of yourself ( for your gym, or dance class or whatever make you feel great)
* > 📚150€ of books or education - At Paradox, we are learner lovers and we want to support you in that
* > 🔥6 1:1coachings - A Paradox Coach supporting you on anything personal or professional, we want you to live your best life


**How To Apply 📃**
 ⚠️ To complete the recruitment process,
 **each candidate must organize calls with his or her previous managers. If you are not comfortable with this : do not apply** 
 ⚠️
   

  

 If all this sounds good to you, come and write the next chapter with us
 **🚀🚀🚀🚀**
**HIRING PROCESS 📃**
- 

 That job description resonated with you?
   

  

**Here is your tailor made hiring process**
**📃 A 6 to 8 minutes** 
 application survey (with a short video assignment)
   

  

**💻 A 30mn video call** 
 to deep dive into your career path and ambitions
   

  

**💻 A 1h video call** 
 to discuss how you'd fit into Paradox’s Product team
   

  

**💻 A 1h culture-fit video call** 
 to assess alignment with our values and mindset
   

  

**💻 A final video call** 
 to discuss Product Vision and the next milestones to build
   

  

**💼 Reference check** 
 to understand how you operate across environments and help set you up for a smooth onboarding
   

  

**🫵🚀 Welcome aboard!**
**About Our Hiring Process**
 Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.
   

  

 We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.
   

  

 If you believe what we believe: that learning should feel cinematic, alive, and transformative, this isn’t a career move.
   

  

 It’s your next masterpiece.
   

  

 Welcome to
 **Paradox.**
 Let’s build the Operating System for Greatness.

title: Software Engineer within Clinical Decision Support
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 Cambio Clinical Decision Support (CDS) is looking for a Fullstack Software Engineer to help us transform the way clinical decisions are supported at the point of care. The CDS team builds intelligent software tools that integrate patient data, clinical guidelines, and analytics into real-time decision-making for healthcare professionals.
   

  

 You will work across both backend and frontend development to build scalable, data-driven applications that impact thousands of clinicians and patients. Our infrastructure follows a modern DevOps approach with continuous integration and delivery.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain high-quality features across the full stack
* Build scalable backend services using Kotlin/Java, Spring Boot, and containerized environments (Docker/Kubernetes)
* Develop performant and accessible frontends using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, and Web Components
* Collaborate with requirement owners, developers, and clinical rule modelers to extend our platform
* Contribute to architectural and design decisions with a focus on quality, reliability, and user experience


**About You**
 You are a curious and humble team player who enjoys solving complex problems and following tasks with attention to detail. You’re motivated by the potential of health IT and the opportunity to directly improve patient care.
   

  

 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together—values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* Proven experience in software development (mid to senior level)
* Strong understanding of HTTP/REST and API design
* Experience developing services with Kotlin/Java/Spring Boot and Docker/Kubernetes
* Solid grasp of HTML, CSS, modern JavaScript/TypeScript, and Web Components
* Professional working proficiency in English


**It's a bonus if you**
* Experience in healthcare or health technology
* Experience in user-centered design and accessibility
* Understanding of machine learning, NLP, or GenAI-based systems
* Experience with rules-based or business process support systems
* Experience deploying and monitoring cloud infrastructure
* Proficiency in Linux/macOS development environments


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Additional Information:** 
 The role involves access to sensitive information, therefore a background check will be conducted on the final candidate.
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Senior Growth Manager - EdTech (French fluent 🇫🇷)
description:
Are you obsessed with turning insights into measurable growth?
   

  

 What if your experiments didn’t just lift conversions but shaped how millions of people grow, learn, and act on their potential?
   

  

**This Isn’t Another Growth Job.**
**It’s the chance to define a new category : The EcoSystem** 
 for Human Greatness Augmented with AI, combining behavioral science, technology, and AI.
   

  

**We’re not looking for someone who only advises on what to test, we’re looking for someone who builds it.**
**A hands-on Head Of Growth who can ideate, copy, design the strategy and launch experiments directly.**
**Someone who speaks both data and persuasion fluently, and leverages AI tools daily to generate hypotheses, build assets, and accelerate iteration speed.**
**And you deserve it because you are…**
* A Conversion Architect, skilled at diagnosing funnel bottlenecks and translating data into structured experimentation roadmaps that deliver measurable business outcomes.
* A Behavioral Strategist, fascinated by what drives human action, able to mix cognitive psychology, UX, and persuasion frameworks to design experiences that convert because they resonate.
* A Data-driven Creator, fluent in GA4, Hotjar, AB Tasty, VWO, Amplitude, not just running tests, but connecting insights to revenue, retention, and lifetime value.


 This is a full-time position, carried out
 **remotely or from our beautiful offices** 
 in Dubaï or Lisbon.
   

  

**About Paradox**
**French and English fluency is required.**
**What We Do**
 At Paradox, we are convinced that greatness is trainable.

 we want to empower people at scale, by leveraging cutting edge technologies like AI, and crafting user experiences with outstanding aesthetics.
